text:
The Architect - creator of the Vault
and all drone intelligence - has vanished.

No warning. Just gone.

In his absence, the Vault has become corrupted.

Its corridors became twisted into a cryptic maze,
teeming with A.I defences.

You are a pilot. An explorer.

Entering the Vault to unravel the AI's enigma -

and stop a system-wide fail-safe
before it activates.

The Architect's secrets lie ahead.

Solve the puzzles. Survive the machines.

Or be erased with everything else.
